akn:subsection.akn:heading: Adherence to obligations under Uruguay Round Agreements

akn:content.akn:p: (e) Adherence to obligations under Uruguay Round Agreements In determining whether to enter into negotiations with a particular country, the President shall take into account the extent to which that country has implemented, or has accelerated the implementation of, its obligations under the Uruguay Round Agreements.
